H0.text: Who would take silk as part of their job. Judge

H1.text: Who would take silk as part of their job. Lawyer

H2.text: Who would take silk as part of their job. Diplomat

H3.text: Who would take silk as part of their job. Barrister

A4.text: Successful applicants are normally barristers (or, in Scotland, advocates) with at least 10-15 years of experience.

A5.text: They wear the same black frock coat and waistcoat worn when appearing in court (never the 'bum freezer', however) but add lace at the wrists and a lace stock at the collar.

A6.text: U-turn lets QC title live on for now
